name: parking
description:
The parking command extracts parking lots, garages, and spaces from OSM data. Features include:

- Parking type detection (surface, underground, multi-storey, rooftop)
- Capacity information
- Access and fee details
- Area calculation with capacity estimation

Useful for urban planning and navigation applications.

options.--type: Parking type: surface, underground, multi-storey, rooftop, all (default: all)
options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv (default: geojson)

output:
Parking facilities with:
- parking: Type (surface, underground, etc.)
- name: Facility name
- access: Public, private, customers, etc.
- fee: yes/no
- capacity: Number of spaces (actual or estimated)
- operator: Operating company
- area_sqm: Area in square meters
- Geometry: Point or Polygon
